amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 116-330 to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to limit the scope of the moratorium on taking and importing marine mammals and marine mammal products, and revise the requirements for obtaining an authorization for incidentally taking by harassment marine mammals.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to limit the scope of the moratorium on taking and importing marine mammals and marine mammal products, and revise the requirements for obtaining an authorization for incidentally taking by harassment marine mammals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (LA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 259 (Roll no. 666).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (LA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 259 (Roll no. 666).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Johnson (LA).
